item.title: Announcing SampTA 2023
item.description: SampTA is back! This year’s Sampling Theory and Applications conference will be held at Yale University from July 10-14th, 2023. Our Plenary Speakers will include Coralia Cartis, Rebecca Willett, and Mark Iwen, among many others. See our full list here. Further details (including sessions, and a detailed schedule) are coming soon. We’ll keep this page updated with the latest details.
